A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was deeply disappointing; I went into this fully expecting to love it and came out feeling like Rian Johnson was flipping me off for two and a half hours straight.  It basically comes down to how much of a Star Wars fan you are.  If you're only casually interested\, you may still enjoy the movie - clearly some people do.  However\, if you're a huge\, lifelong fan\, prepare to see everything you love about the series ruined (not just characters but also concepts) along with huge time-wasting plot gambits that go nowhere.  I will not be seeing any of the other new Star Wars films\, which is a shamed because I actually liked TFA.
